sam.name: Samuel Emard-Thibault
sam.about: Hi, my name is Sam, I'm from Ottawa, and am completing my studies in Kingston, ON. I enjoy working on web applications and exploring emerging technologies such as React, Flask, and Spring Boot!
sam.about_short: Hi, my name is Sam, I'm from Ottawa, and am completing my studies in Kingston, ON.
sam.education: Rising junior studying Computer Engineering at Queen's University in ON, Canada.
sam.work_experience: Computer Science Tutor, Queen's Racing Electrical Team Member
sam.hobbies: Working on cars, Buildings computers, Playing video games

luke.name: Luke Cheseldine
luke.about: Hi! I'm Luke and I'm from Maine! I'm currently studying computer science in Toronto. I'm interested in fullstack web development and computer vision. I'm also super stoked to learn more this summer about everything that goes on behind the scenes to deploy and support web apps!
